rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Koikoi has fallen in love with
many different Drivers, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0002
rows.name:
But recently, something
caught my attention, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Some Drivers have two or even
three Blades with them, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Apparently, some of them switch
Blades skillfully during battle
to attack relentlessly, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0005
rows.name:
If they also consider the Blade's element
and use Driver Combos and Blade Combos,
there's no room for a counterattack, mo!

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0006
rows.name:
So, if Koikoi were to marry
someone like that and we had
a marital squabble...

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0007
rows.name:
I'd be relentlessly attacked by my
husband and his three Blades, mo!

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0009
rows.name:
Moh?! I need to stop chatting
and get back to work, so many
customers are here, mo?!
